attributes.action: Make mortgage payments for those becoming unemployed up to the same amount as rent payments are made for those in rented accomodation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Someone becoming unemployed only receives financial support for the interest on a mortgage, whereas those in rented accomodation receive the full amount of rent. This is insufficient to satisfy mortgage lenders and consequently puts them at risk of repossession. Up to a certain ceiling the whole mortgage payments should be made.
